title: A paddy fields view land for sale.
details:
This land is situated at Bogahagoda , walikonda road. From the Bogahagoda Akuressa main road to land 1.0 km. Rectangle type land. The land faced to the road and back side has a huge paddy field. Very nice scenario .well water and pipe borne water. Electricity.
An ideal for a tourist villa, cultivate . Close to the highway entrance at wathawana.
